I personally like "LICENSE" as a file name (without extension) more.
[Corefx](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx) uses this way of naming, but coreclr does LICENSE.txt
Also GitHub's default location for it is "LICENSE".

Anyway, I think it's less the issue, more aesthetics.
